name: Light Golden Cake
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add shorten- ing. Mix together milk and flavoring. Pour a little over half of milk and flavoring mixture into above mixture. Beat 2 minutes. Add remaining milk and beat 2 minutes. Pour into greased and floured pans. Bake at 350Â° until cake tests done. Cool. Finish with filling or frosting as desired.
